ImageProgram

Class ImageObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageProgram.ImageObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ImageObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An ImageObject that can contain Tags, associated with an actual image file on the system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ImageDirectory directory
      The ImageDirectory that is associated with this ImageObject.
      java.io.File file
      The File object associated with this ImageObject.
      Log log
      The Log containing all the changes that have been made to this ImageObject.
      java.lang.String name
      The file name of this ImageObject, without it's file extension or Tags.
      java.lang.String path
      The file path of this ImageObject, excluding the file name and extension.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageObject(java.io.File file)
      Creates an ImageObject object associated with an actual image file.

      • ImageObject

        public ImageObject(java.io.File file)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an ImageObject object associated with an actual image file.
        Parameters:
        file - The File that represents an actual image file on the computer.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file does not exist.

        public void setName(java.lang.String newName)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Changes the name of this ImageObject. The file on the system is updated appropriately
        Parameters:
        newName - The new name to change to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If changing the name will cause a file to be overwritten.

        public Tag getTagString(java.lang.String name)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the Tag associated with this ImageObject matching the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Tag.
        Returns:
        The Tag matching the name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If no Tag by the given name is found in this ImageObject.

      • addTag

        public void addTag(Tag newTag)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds the new Tag to this ImageObject.
        Parameters:
        newTag - The new Tag to be added to this ImageObject.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If overwriting an existing file.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Tag already has this Image.

      • removeTag

        public void removeTag(Tag tag)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes the Tag from this ImageObject.
        Parameters:
        tag - The Tag object to remove.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If overwriting an existing file.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Tag does not exist in the ImageObject.

      • revertChanges

        public void revertChanges(int index)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Reverts this ImageObject to the specified index in it's Log.
        Parameters:
        index - The Index of the change to revert to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the new file name could not be written.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the index is out of the range of the Log.

      • revertLast

        public void revertLast()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Reverts this ImageObject to it's previous state. The last LogEntry in it's Log is also removed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file name could not be written.
